name: early-bird

effect.scarlet_violet: This Pokémon's remaining sleep turn count falls by 2 rather than 1. If this Pokémon's sleep counter is at 1, it will fall to 0 and then the Pokémon will wake up.
effect.the_teal_mask: This Pokémon's remaining sleep turn count falls by 2 rather than 1. If this Pokémon's sleep counter is at 1, it will fall to 0 and then the Pokémon will wake up.
effect.the_indigo_disk: This Pokémon's remaining sleep turn count falls by 2 rather than 1. If this Pokémon's sleep counter is at 1, it will fall to 0 and then the Pokémon will wake up.

short_effect: Makes sleep pass twice as quickly.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The Pokémon awakens from sleep twice as fast as other Pokémon.
